block-att.description: Cancel attacks for next turn (all animal attacks)
block-att.name: Block all attacks for 1 turn

draw-2.ability: Draw 2 cards from the main deck
draw-2.description: Draw 2 cards from the main deck
draw-2.name: Draw 2 cards from main deck

2-anim-1hp.ability: Return 2 dead animals to deck for 1HP

2-anim-1hp.name: Return 2 dead animals to deck for 1HP

block-pow.ability: Block using power cards for 1 turn
block-pow.description: Block opponent from using power cards
block-pow.name: Block using power cards for 1 turn

1-anim-deck.description: Return 1 animal to deck from animal graveyard
1-anim-deck.name: Return 1 dead animal to deck

place-king.ability: Place an active king on board

double-king-ap.ability: Double king ability in its env
double-king-ap.description: Double king ability in its env
double-king-ap.name: Double king ability in its env

rev-anim-2hp.description: Sacrifice 2 hp to revive any animal, can attack
rev-anim-2hp.name: Revive any animal for 2HP

steal-anim-3hp.description: Sacrifice 3 hp to switch side of an opponent animal
steal-anim-3hp.name: Steal animal opponent for 3hp

rev-last-anim-1p.name: Revive last animal for 1HP
